name: Pit of Evil
description: Barry and his friends Arlene and Nellie decide to visit the Pit of Evil, the place where they lost their friend Fynn. While spending the night in a tent, things take an unexpected turn. The group gets seperated, while Barry suffers the same fate as Fynn, falling into the Pit of Evil.
minimum_requirements: OS: WindowsÂ® 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit) Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9 / OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space
